OrgName: The HR Manager DBA The Applicant Manager
activities: The Applicant Manager provides a software platform to customers (“employers”) to help them manage their recruitment functions, and also allows candidates (“applicants”) to apply for job openings and refer others to those openings. The Applicant Manager does not use any employer or applicant information directly (other than in aggregate, statistical form). Each employer maintains a recruitment site through The Applicant Manager platform, which site may appear to applicants as an extension of the employer’s public website.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: If you have questions or complaints regarding our privacy policy or practices, please contact us at admin@theapplicantmanager.com.  If we cannot resolve a complaint or dispute, we agree to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
